categories.name: Advanced Features
categories.description: Advanced features and capabilities of the chat system

topics.title: Custom AI Models
topics.content: You can switch between different AI models including GPT-4, Claude, and specialized coding models. Each model has different strengths for various tasks.

topics.title: Document Collaboration
topics.content: The AI can create and edit documents in real-time. You can request changes, additions, or modifications to any document.

topics.title: Code Generation
topics.content: Generate complete, runnable code snippets in multiple programming languages. The AI understands context and can create functions, classes, and full applications.

topics.title: Multi-modal Input
topics.content: Upload images, documents, and other files to discuss their content with the AI. The system can analyze and provide insights about uploaded materials.
